name: WooCommerce Save Manual Order User
author: Tim's Solutions

sections.description: Adds an option to the WooCommerce order actions to save the billing details as a user. The option only shows when the billing user does not already exist and has a email address, first name and last name.
sections.installation:
Install WooCommerce Save Manual Order User either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server.

Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
I can’t see the Save billing details as WordPress user option?

The billing details must contain a first and last name as well as an email address.
The option will not show if the email address is already registered as a user.
sections.changelog:

  • Updated compatibility for WooCommerce 4.8.0 & WordPress 5.7

1.0

Release Date: 7th March 2020

  • Updated to be compatible with WordPress 5.4 & WooCommerce 4.0.0

0.1

Release Date: 14th February 2020

  • Initial release.
